p: The mRest (measure rest) element is used to indicate a complete measure rest, independent from the meter of the current measure. The@cutoutattribute provides for the description of the rendition of the mRest. If@cutoutis set to ‘cutout’ (the only value allowed), then the complete staff including the staff lines will not be rendered for this measure. It is a semantic error to mix an mRest with other events in the same layer. However, other ‘control events’, such as fermata, may be used at the same time as mRest.
